pullrequest.title: Fix QT rendering, and rendering update rate (DEFAULT)

content.raw: I patched the TimePanel and Camera changes to display FPS onto the default branch and it had an average FPS under 30 and it looks noticeably choppy with the double pendulum model swinging. Testing this branch now...
content.html: I patched the TimePanel and Camera changes to display FPS onto the default branch and it had an average FPS under 30 and it looks noticeably choppy with the double pendulum model swinging. Testing this branch now...
